root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 8-10-2, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability

Description:

Countries that have at least 1 data point after 2010 for this indicator:

  • Asia and Pacific: 35
  • Africa: 38
  • Latin America and the Caribbean: 21
  • Europe, North America, Australia, New Zealand and Japan: 47

Time series:

2011 and 2014. To be collected every 3 years.

Disaggregation:

Disaggregation by Income; Age; Education level; Urban/rural; Gender
